reviews.customers_say: Customers love this sweater's style, describing it as a perfect combination of sexy and trendy, and appreciate its comfort, softness, and quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fit and color is gorgeous!
items.body: The PRETTYGARDEN Women’s Sweater is gorgeous! I bought the rust color in a size small. It’s a definite wardrobe staple that can be worn year round. With its off-the-shoulder design and loose, knitted construction, this sweater effortlessly combines casual elegance with a touch of sophistication. Whether you’re heading out for a lunch date with friends or dressing up for a cozy date night, this piece adapts seamlessly to your plans. One of the standout features of this sweater is its softness. The fabric feels luxurious against the skin, ensuring all-day comfort without any irritation. Its loose fit is flattering on different body types, providing a relaxed yet stylish silhouette that exudes effortless charm. The off-the-shoulder neckline adds a trendy, feminine touch, making it ideal for creating chic outfits. This sweater pairs beautifully with jeans, skirts, or leggings, allowing for countless styling possibilities. Add heels or ankle boots for a polished look, or keep it casual with sneakers. Its versatility makes it a go-to option for both spring layering and cozy winter outfits. While the loose fit adds to its appeal, some might find it a bit oversized depending on their personal style preferences. Additionally, the knitted material may require gentle care to maintain its softness and prevent snags over time. Overall, the PRETTYGARDEN Women’s Sweater is a stylish, soft, and flattering. It’s the perfect combination of sexy and trendy! Read more
items.author: Kb

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy sweater
items.body: Soft and washes well. Lightweight but super cozy and color very pretty. Fit is o resized like picture. I wear a small and ordered a small. Fits perfect. Read more
items.author: Bridget M. Rini

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very soft but not made for my shape.
items.body: I bought this sweater for work wear, hoping it would be both comfortable and versatile. The fabric is definitely soft and pleasant to the touch, which I really appreciate for all-day wear. However, the overall fit wasn’t quite what I expected based on the photos. It ended up being shorter and more fitted than I anticipated, which was a disappointment since I have a long torso and prefer a bit more length. The neckline is a nice design detail and adds a touch of charm, but unfortunately it didn’t work well with my body shape. I have broad shoulders, and the cut of the sweater made it difficult for the neckline to sit comfortably over both shoulders without feeling restrictive. It’s one of those cases where the style looks great on the model but doesn’t translate as well in real life for certain body types. Although I decided to keep the sweater, I’m not sure how often I’ll actually wear it. It might work for the right outfit combination, but it’s not a go-to piece for me as I originally hoped. The softness and color are definite positives, but the fit just wasn’t ideal for my frame, making it more of a “sometimes” piece in my wardrobe rather than a regular staple. Read more
items.author: KimN

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, would recommend
items.body: Knocking this down 1 star ONLY because the fabric isn’t super soft. But the sweater overall is good quality & the style is perfect. It’s not too thick & not too thin. Tucks nicely. The off the shoulder part sits nicely. TTS Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it!
items.body: Super cute, soft and comfy! Looks like the actual picture! Read more
items.author: McKenna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Very cute, fits well, get so many compliments lol. Even have had people borrow it from me. The pic attached makes the folded part on the top look smaller than the irem picture, but it can be made longer like the original picture; just showing the versatility of the top. Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Updated after washed one time- not so good Perfect winter sweater
items.body: ****Please read update if looking to buy. This sweater is beautiful. Fits nice and comfy. Looks great on. Update: after first wash…. Only put on delicate and hung to dry as directions said. It has balled up all over the sweater. I am Disappointed in the quality. I loved this sweater too. I would not recommend for this price for a one time use. Read more
items.author: Scott Lowe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing sweater
items.body: So soft and comfortable, longer in the sleeves but amazing quality! Read more
items.author: Torey

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Army Green, Beige White, Dark Grey, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Brick Red, Mist Blue, Dark Green, Light Blue, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
